segments.text: This kitchen setup seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her apron dries a plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is full and overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs down the cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy uses a stool to access the upper shelf.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He grabs from the cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A plate balances in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs spread unevenly on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, palm outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a tidy garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack on the counter, waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a snapshot of daily life with hidden edges.
segments.speaker: PAR
